effect.name: Composite Video Compression (Texture)
effect.description: The shader simulates analog video compression similar to how a composite cable worked.
effect.author: Foxioo

parameter.name: /* Foxioo Composite Video Compression (Texture) Shader | 1.0 (22.12.2025) */
parameter.description: The shader simulates analog video compression similar to how a composite cable worked.

parameter.name: Mixing
parameter.description: This variable is responsible for the visibility of the effect.

parameter.name: _Seed
parameter.description: This variable specifies which seed should be used for the random noise pattern.

parameter.name: _Time
parameter.description: The variable defines the time positions of the distortion animation.

parameter.name: _FraqMul
parameter.description: The variable multiplies the colors of the signal waves, changing the hue.

parameter.name: _Hertz
parameter.description: This variable determines the frequency of the video system (e.g., 50 Hz PAL, 59.94 Hz NTSC). Changing this value affects the thickness and spacing of the shift lines.

parameter.name: Pb' OffsetX
parameter.description: The variable shifts the positions on the X axis of the Pb' signal.

parameter.name: Pb' OffsetY
parameter.description: The variable shifts the positions on the Y axis of the Pb' signal.

parameter.name: Pr' OffsetX
parameter.description: The variable shifts the positions on the X axis of the Pr' signal.

parameter.name: Pr' OffsetY
parameter.description: The variable shifts the positions on the Y axis of the Pr' signal.

parameter.name: _Phase
parameter.description: The variable determines the phase of the horizontal shift line, causing rippling.
